mapper.sql: id, name, position, level, creator, create_date, updater, update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_flow_object ( name, position, level, creator, create_date, updater, update_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{position}, #{level}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{updater}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM doc_flow_object
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND position LIKE CONCAT('%', #{position}, '%')
ORDER BY create_date DESC
SELECT FROM doc_flow_object where level != 0 ORDER BY level ASC, create_date DESC
